# Preamble

```{r index_setup}
library(tidyverse)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.height = 3, fig.width = 4)
```


```{r frontpiece-plot, fig.height=5, fig.width=5, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, colour = color)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```
